categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Rentean was a planet in the Jjannex sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

It was inhabited by Humans who aided the Alliance to Restore the Republic by manufacturing starfighters. This aid was discovered the Galactic Empire after they interrogated a captured Bothan spy. The Empire subsequently dispatched at team to infiltrate the secret shipbuilding facility, destroy it, and punish the local inhabitants.
